content:
@Morgan Gleason @olivierkarasira @Bray Patrick-Lake @Hamish MacDonald @Hamza Salem (and anyone):

Reminder: the weekly call for the Patient Empowerment Workgroup is Thursday (tomorrow) 1pm ET.

The draft agenda is still in process but near final published.

https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/322275573

Phone: +1 (872) 240-3212, access code 322275573
<tel:+18722403212,,322275573#
I can't make it today, I have a soccer game. Have a good one!
Thanks @Dave deBronkart The time zone takes me out of contention, but good to know about this. Are there outcomes / notes available to catch up on post-meetings?
